summary: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

Monaghan|Charles Morton|Ron Nyman|Gloria Pall|Jack Pennick|Bob Reeves|Robert Robinson|John Roy|Jack Stoney|S. Tarnell|Herb Vigran|Sailor Vincent
title: 20.000 leguas de viaje submarino
